sentences.sentence: He was egocentric, a man of impulse who expected those around him to serve him.
sentences.translation: 他自我中心，易冲动，希望周围的人为他服务。
人类是非常以自我为中心的。

sentences.sentence: In fact, Guugu Yimithirr doesn't make any use of egocentric coordinates at all.
